name: DrMom
description:
My Mom's favourite game remastered in UE4. :)
Created during one of the first waves of the covid-19 pandemic in 2020.

Place marbles/viruses in lines of 5 in the same color and gather points!

Exciting. Addictive.

Saves are stored inside [WindowsDrive]:\Users\[YourUserName]\AppData\Local\Kulki
